metadata.title: CVE-2024-36978 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: sch_multiq: fix possible OOB write in multiq_tune()q->bands will be assigned to qopt->bands to execute subsequent code logicafter kmalloc. So the old q->bands should not be used in kmalloc.Otherwise, an out-of-bounds write will occur.
